info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:02PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Madison and central Gallatin Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 501 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ennis, or 12 miles east of Virginia City, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Virginia City, Ennis, Norris, Jeffers, Cameron and Mcallister. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
